The treasure of tranquillity. Or A manuall of morall discourses tending to the tranquillity of minde. Translated out of French by I.M. Master of Arts. Maxwell, James, b. 1581.
[42], 155, [5] p.
Printed by Nicholas Okes, for Samuel Rand, and are to be sold at his shop neere Holborne Bridge, London : 1611.
A translation, by James Maxwell, of the French original. Errata on a10r. Running title reads: A manuall of morall discourses. Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
=======
